BusDK Design Document

BusDK Design Spec: Example end-to-end workflow

This section is split into single-concept documents. Each page is written as a small, ordered sequence so that the relevant bus <module> <subcommand> invocations and their typical order are easy to scan.

The recommended reading order is:

  1. Accounting workflow overview (current planned modules)
  2. Scenario introduction
  3. Initialize a new repository
  4. Configure the chart of accounts
  5. Add a sales invoice (interactive workflow)
  6. Invoice ledger impact (integration through journal entries)
  7. Record a purchase as a journal transaction
  8. Import bank transactions and apply payments
  9. AI-assisted classification (review before recording a revision)
  10. Budgeting and budget-vs-actual reporting
  11. VAT reporting and payment
  12. Year-end close (closing entries)
  13. Evolution over time (extending the model)
  14. Workflow takeaways (transparency, control, automation)

← Validation and safety checks BusDK Design Document Accounting workflow overview (current planned modules) →
